title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, ...) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client for the Ollama API; install via pip install ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official Ollama JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; npm i ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embed provider in Python.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface that connects to local Ollama instance; docker-compose ready.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven Central artifact net.ollama:ollama4j.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models; cargo install ollama-cli.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example: loads PDFs into Chroma vector store and answers questions with Ollama embeddings + Llama 2.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into any channel; configurable roles & limits.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-affinity and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama API; nimble install ollama.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered apps.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama; NuGet package OllamaSharp with chat, embed, model management.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts via Ollama and insert results into notes.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama; crates.io/ollama-rs with async client and streaming.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama; go get github.com/ollama/ollama/go.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that answers questions using local Ollama models; Bolt.js framework.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI that connects to Ollama; pip install streamlit-ollama.
